wikitext.*:
'''''uial''''' is a [[Sindarin]] (and [[Noldorin]]) word meaning "[[twilight]]".<ref>{{S|Appendix}}</ref><ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}, pp. 362, 400</ref>

==Etymoloy==
In the [[The Etymologies|''Etymologies'']], Noldorin ''uial'' is mentioned under [[Sundocarme|roots]] [[KAL]] and [[YŪ]].<ref name=LR/>

==Examples==
* ''[[Aelin-uial|Aelin-'''uial''']]'' = "Meres of Twilight"
* ''[[Emyn Uial|Emyn '''Uial''']]'' = "Hills of Evendim"
* ''Glad'''uial''''' = "Twilight Wood" (other name of [[Nan Elmoth]])
* ''[[Nenuial|Nen'''uial''']]'' = "Lake Evendim"

==Cognates==
*[[Quenya]] ''úyale''
